ygData.subject: RE: feign death
ygData.msgSnippet: Easy.  If you re getting hit, it won t work.  If you re being cast upon, it won t work.  So you have to either put some distance between yourself and what s
ygData.messageBody:
Easy. If you're getting hit, it won't work. If you're being cast upon, it
won't work. So you have to either put some distance between yourself and
what's whackin' ya, or time it between spell casts. In my experience, if a
baddie casts a DOT on me, I will never fool them.

Plus you have the baddies that will remember you, and come back after you
after you pop back up. SG's and Harriers and stuff.



-----Original Message-----
From: CLMarkley@... [mailto:CLMarkley@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 3:19 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] feign death


From: CLMarkley@...

I just got the skill, and used all my practices to max it. Now i was
wondering if anyone has any tips as hhow to make it work more reliably, and
a
list of the types of (or individual) mobs that can see through it.
